title: Countries Argue About Fossil Fuels at Climate Meeting
summary: At a big meeting called COP30, countries are having a big argument about fossil fuels like coal, oil, and gas. These fuels make the Earth warmer, but some countries want to keep using them. The leaders removed the words about stopping fossil fuels from an important paper. This might be a trick to get a better deal later. It's important because we need to protect our planet from climate change. Everyone is talking and trying to find a solution that helps the Earth and people.

background_read: Climate change is when the Earth gets too warm because of pollution from things like cars and factories. Fossil fuels are a big part of this problem. At meetings like COP30, world leaders come together to talk about how to reduce pollution and protect the environment for the future.
Article_Structure: WHO: Countries and leaders at the COP30 meeting
WHAT: They argued and removed mention of fossil fuels from a draft deal
WHERE: At the COP30 climate summit
WHY: It might be a tactic to negotiate a better agreement on climate change

perspectives.description: Some people think we must stop using fossil fuels to save the planet.
Others worry that stopping fossil fuels too fast could hurt jobs and money.
